2.text:
We're at the dance studio in central
London

4.text: and I'm completely out of my depth

10.text: I'm here to launch this year's

12.text:
first-ever danceathon for Comic Relief
we're getting

15.text:
people across the country to dance
continuously

18.text: so I should be don't think while I'm doing that, for six hours

21.text: I have always been a huge fan of Comic Relief and I've always wanted to get involved, and so to

26.text:
be offered the chance I jumped at it. I'm
ready to get on stage and dance for six hours

31.text:
Well I decided to take part because
unfortunately Comic Relief knows that I will

35.text: do pretty much anything that they ask

37.text: and having done some dancing things on the telly, they were like

41.text:
This is the perfect fit! Dance monkey boy,
dance - so here I am

46.text: My dance partner and I are doing one of the segments of the six hour danceathon

50.text: and we want to get all of the nation dancing

53.text: Since Pussycat Dolls' 'Don't Cha', the leg grab and pull

57.text: has become the Kimberly Wyatt signature move

60.text: I think to dance, to do something fun to raise money is just an amazing idea

64.text: Comic Relief is something I've supported for many many years it does such important work both

69.text: here and in Africa, I'm fortunate enough to have visited many of the countries where

73.text: people are helped. So the least I could do is to embarrass myself for six hours

81.text: Find out right here how you can get involved - details are in the description bit below
